### JSON Schema
The timeline follows a structured format with the following key components:
#### Metadata
- **title**: Timeline identifier
- **start_date/end_date**: Timeline boundaries
- **last_updated**: Automatic timestamp of last modification
- **version**: Semantic versioning for timeline iterations
- **total_days**: Calculated duration
- **status**: Current timeline state (active/archived/paused)
#### Events
Each event contains:
- **id**: Unique identifier (event_XXX format)
- **date**: ISO date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
- **timestamp**: Full ISO 8601 timestamp with timezone
- **title**: Brief event description
- **description**: Detailed event information
- **category**: Event classification (milestone/task/update/meeting/deadline)
- **priority**: Importance level (high/medium/low)
- **tags**: Searchable keywords array
- **metadata**: Additional information (source, verification, attachments)
#### Categories
Predefined event types with visual styling:
- **Milestone**: Major achievements (red, flag icon)
- **Task**: Completed deliverables (teal, check icon)
- **Update**: Progress reports (blue, info icon)
- **Meeting**: Collaborative sessions (green, users icon)
- **Deadline**: Time-sensitive items (yellow, clock icon)
## Usage
### Adding Events
```
{
  "id": "event_XXX",
  "date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
  "timestamp": "YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS-04:00",
  "title": "Event Title",
  "description": "Detailed description",
  "category": "milestone|task|update|meeting|deadline",
  "priority": "high|medium|low",
  "tags": ["tag1", "tag2"],
  "metadata": {
    "source": "user_input|system|import",
    "verified": true|false,
    "attachments": []
  }
}
```
